title: WALKWAY ORB / party scene afterthought
description: Someone either had the most depressing solo-party... or there's a sequence killer on the loose.

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "Snow is quietly covering the numero..."
dialogueTree.text: Snow is quietly covering the numerous wine bottles and cigarette butts on the ground. Someone *partied* really, really hard here.

links.title: You: "Wait, how hard?"
links.text: Wait, how hard?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Well, they went through six bottles..."
links.text: Well, they went through six bottles of *Potent Pilsner*, three bottles of *Commodore Red*, and almost four packs of cigarettes -- it must have been pretty hard.

links.title: You: ""Did I do this?""
links.text: "Did I do this?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well..." The lieutenant looks at y..."
links.text: "Well..." The lieutenant looks at you, then the bottles. "Yes. I think we can say with relative confidence that it was you."

links.title: You: ""This is really sad. I must have be..."
links.text: "This is really sad. I must have been miserable."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes," the lieutenant agrees. "This..."
links.text: "Yes," the lieutenant agrees. "This scene isn't exactly ripping with joy. Let's just move on." He turns to leave.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "No, no, *bratan*, I'm sure it was a..."
links.text: No, no, *bratan*, I'm sure it was a blast. When do you and I *not* have fun together? Don't answer that, just take that positive feeling and run along!

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yeah, it doesn't exactly look like..."
links.text: Yeah, it doesn't exactly look like someone really enjoyed themselves here. No point in dwelling on it now, better keep moving.

links.title: You: ""Looks like I had a lot of fun.""
links.text: "Looks like I had a lot of fun."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It really *really* doesn't." The l..."
links.text: "It really *really* doesn't." The lieutenant turns to go. "Let's turn our attention elsewhere and move on."

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "You said it, *bratan*! And this can..."
links.text: You said it, *bratan*! And this can happen again if we want to. And we want to. Only in a different place. Right now you gotta keep moving.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yeah... a *lot* of fun. Better not..."
links.text: Yeah... a *lot* of fun. Better not think about it and just move on.

links.title: You: ""I'm still not completely convinced..."
links.text: "I'm still not completely convinced it was me."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am. But it doesn't matter right..."
links.text: "I am. But it doesn't matter right now. Let's just move on."

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Well, I am. Who else could crush su..."
links.text: Well, I am. Who else could crush such quantities, *bratan*? This is wild. You are wild. We should do this again. But right now you should keep moving.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Move away from this scene and you d..."
links.text: Move away from this scene and you don't have to think about it anymore. Just walk away and it's *gone*!

links.title: You: ""I must have been on an advanced sc..."
links.text: "I must have been on an advanced scouting mission in the harbour."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes," the lieutenant marks dryly...."
links.text: "Yes," the lieutenant marks dryly. "This looks pretty advanced alright. For now, let's just move on."

links.title: Horrific Necktie: ""Oh *SO* advanced. Deep in the enem..."
links.text: "Oh *SO* advanced. Deep in the enemy territory -- getting fucked up right under everyone's nose -- high on life and adrenaline... and alcohol apparently." The tie tightens around your neck. "I'm very proud of you."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yes. That's what this was. A reconn..."
links.text: Yes. That's what this was. A reconnaissance mission. Wish you'd only remember the good intel you brought back...

links.title: You: "Let's just move on. [Finish thought..."
links.text: Let's just move on. [Finish thought.]

links.title: Inland Empire: "Look at it. Of course it was you. Y..."
links.text: Look at it. Of course it was you. You *partied* here.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Yeah we did, *bratan*! And from the..."
links.text: Yeah we did, *bratan*! And from the looks of it we had hell of a time. Hell of a time, *bratan*.

links.title: You: "It's probably nothing. [Discard tho..."
links.text: It's probably nothing. [Discard thought.]

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "Numerous empty wine bottles glisten..."
dialogueTree.text: Numerous empty wine bottles glisten in the rain. Someone *partied* really, really hard here.

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "All those empty wine bottles and ci..."
dialogueTree.text: All those empty wine bottles and cigarette butts on the ground... Someone *partied* really, really hard here.
